name: Caltrop Golem
description: The Caltrop Golem appears as a pile of caltrops, indistinguishable from an ordinary one when scattered. It is agile and capable of ambush tactics, utilizing its environment effectively.
memorable: It can scatter itself and reform, controlling the battlefield with caltrops and dealing damage to foes who traverse its area.
goals: To ambush adversaries and control the battlefield by immobilizing enemies.
relations: Constructs and other golems, potentially created by a wizard or artificer.
environment: Typically found in ruins or places where it can surprise intruders.
strengths: High Dexterity grants exceptional stealth and an advantageous position in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to adamantine weapons and unable to act while scattered.
attacks: Utilizes two slam attacks for piercing damage or attacks at range with Steel Shot.
most_powerful_ability: Scattershot can deal significant damage to multiple enemies and knock them prone.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 30 feet, enhancing its ability to detect movement nearby.
skills: Skilled in stealth with a +7 modifier, making it difficult to detect.
additional_information: Can reform itself if scattered and has hit points remaining.
Ambusher ability grants advantage on attacks against surprised foes.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saves against spells.
Can create an area of control with its caltrops.
False Appearance allows it to blend into surroundings while scattered.
test_queries: construct that controls the battlefield with caltrops
medium creature with the ability to scatter
golem that explodes in an area and knocks foes prone
